```{r Sourcing auxiliary functions}
source("../EP-general-auxiliaries.R")
source("Probit-auxiliaries.R")
```

```{r Generating random data}
set.seed(1)
n <- 30
p <- 10

mu.beta <- rep(0, p)
Sigma.beta <- 10000*diag(p)

X <- cbind(rep(1, n), matrix(data = rnorm(n = n*(p - 1)), nrow = n))
beta <- c(rbind(rep(2, p/2), rep(-2, p/2)))/p
y <- rbinom(n = nrow(X), size = 1, prob = pnorm(X%*%beta))
```

```{r EP approximation}
set.seed(1)
ep.res <- ep.approx(X, y, mu.beta, Sigma.beta, 
                    alpha = 1, Q.star = 0.01, r.star = 0, prec = 0,
                    min.passes = 6, max.passes = 200, tol.factor = Inf, stop.factor = Inf, 
                    abs.thresh = 0.01, rel.thresh = 0.9, delta.limit = Inf, patience = 40, verbose = T)
ep.mu <- ep.res$mu
ep.Sigma <- ep.res$Sigma
```

```{r MCMC approximation}
set.seed(1)
stan.res <- stan(file = "Probit-model.stan",
                 data = list(N = n,
                             p = p,
                             X = X,
                             y = y,
                             mu_beta = mu.beta,
                             Sigma_beta = Sigma.beta),
                 chains = 1,
                 iter = 50000,
                 warmup = 5000,
                 init = "random") 

mcmc.samples <- rstan::extract(stan.res)$beta
mcmc.mu <- colMeans(mcmc.samples)
mcmc.Sigma <- var(mcmc.samples)
```

```{r Comparing approximations}
for (j in 1:p) {
  curve(demp(x, obs = mcmc.samples[, j]),
        from = mcmc.mu[j] - 5*sqrt(mcmc.Sigma[j, j]),
        to = mcmc.mu[j] + 5*sqrt(mcmc.Sigma[j, j]))
  abline(v = mcmc.mu[j], lty = 2)
  curve(dnorm(x, ep.mu[j], sqrt(ep.Sigma[j, j])), col = "red", add = TRUE)
}
```
